title: Reroute Prediction Service. (arXiv:2310.08988v1 [cs.LG])
abstract: The cost of delays was estimated as 33 billion US dollars only in 2019 for the US National Airspace System, a peak value following a growth trend in past years. Aiming to address this huge inefficiency, we designed and developed a novel Data Analytics and Machine Learning system, which aims at reducing delays by proactively supporting re-routing decisions.  Given a time interval up to a few days in the future, the system predicts if a reroute advisory for a certain Air Route Traffic Control Center or for a certain advisory identifier will be issued, which may impact the pertinent routes. To deliver such predictions, the system uses historical reroute data, collected from the System Wide Information Management (SWIM) data services provided by the FAA, and weather data, provided by the US National Centers for Environmental Prediction (NCEP). translated_title: 路线重新规划预测服务
translated_abstract: 仅在2019年，美国国家航空空间系统的延误成本就估计为330亿美元，这是过去几年增长趋势的峰值。为了解决这种巨大的低效率问题，我们设计和开发了一种新的数据分析和机器学习系统，旨在通过积极支持重新规划决策来减少延误。该系统在未来几天的时间范围内，预测某个空中管制区域或某个指定的咨询标识是否会发布重新规划建议，从而可能影响相关路线。为了提供这些预测，该系统使用从FAA提供的系统范围信息管理（SWIM）数据服务和美国国家环境预测中心（NCEP）提供的天气数据收集的历史重新规划数据。这些数据量庞大，包含许多以高速率流式传输的不相关和噪声数据。系统持续处理进入的原始数据。
tldr: 该论文介绍了一种新颖的数据分析和机器学习系统，旨在通过积极支持重新规划决策来减少航班延误。该系统使用历史重新规划数据和天气数据预测未来几天是否会发布重新规划建议，以减少影响航线的因素。
en_tdlr: This paper presents a novel data analytics and machine learning system that aims to reduce flight delays by proactively supporting rerouting decisions. The system uses historical reroute data and weather data to predict if reroute advisories will be issued in the future, thereby minimizing the impact on flight routes.
